divs: Sighting Detailsgetting drink of water, notice bright glow behind a 10 foot high plank fencecantsee thru fence stood and watched, blacked out. next morning thought it was justa dreamfound impression, burned, 3 inches in ground. resmbled circle line power symbol,only elongated. no human or machien track seen. baron field before planting, last week of march
